title: Github Copilot Chat: A New Way Too Get Sued
description:
Github Copilot has been here for a bit over 2 years now and it's just as much of a legal nightmare to be using but Microsoft has even more tools avilable for you to get yourself sued with Github Copilot Chat powered by GPT 4.
